editor.restrict_users_tip: Prevents non-admin users from disabling CH or using it's settings.
editor.disabled_template: Disabled: The current value is a template.
editor.editor_warnings_title: Display this info and warnings section.
editor.footer_mode_tip: Turn the header into a footer or reverse split mode.
editor.hide_header_tip: Hide header, but allow swipe out of sidebar.
editor.hide_tab_list: Comma-separated list of tab numbers to hide
editor.kiosk_mode_tip: Hide and disable the header and sidebar
editor.menu_dropdown_tip: Put menu button in options menu.
editor.reverse_tab_tip: Places tabs on right side in reverse order.
editor.show_tab_list: Comma-separated list of tab numbers to show
editor.split_mode_tip: Split header into one header one footer
editor.tab_icons_and_text_tip: Display both icons and text on tabs.
editor.user_list: User (Seperate multiple users with a comma.)
editor.voice_dropdown_tip: Put voice button in options menu.
editor.warning_already_a_template: Designates items that are already a template and won't be modified by the editor.
editor.warning_disable_ch: You can temporaily disable Custom-Header by adding '?disable_ch' to the end of your URL.
editor.warning_edit_ui: Marks items that remove your ability to edit the UI.
editor.warning_jinja_info: Hover over any item for more info. All text options accept Jinja.
